data.Name: Allah-Las
data.Bio: Allah-Las are an American rock band from Los Angeles, California, formed in 2008 around a mutual love for records, Los Angeles history, and the beach. The band members are all surfers and cover the city from the East Side (Mt. Washington) to way out West (Venice Beach) - and their sound reflects the geography of the city. The group consists of Miles Michaud, singer and guitarist, Pedrum Siadatian, electric guitar and vocals, Spencer Dunham, Electric Bass and vocals, and Matthew Correia, drums, percussion and vocals. Read more on Last.fm
